attributes.action: Demand government to release studies showing the benefits of a no deal Brexit
attributes.background: We have had studies showing the damage of Brexit and recently the leaked Yellowhammer report detailing the likely damage a no deal Brexit will have. However we are yet to see any official study showing how a no deal Brexit will be good for the UK and its people. Brexiters and Remainers need to know

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what studies you'd like the Government or Parliament to publish.

You could start a new petition explaning what documents you'd like to see published.
